DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial is conducted to determine the optimal dose of LD02GIFRO in improvement of gastrointestinal motility between each dose group by comparing the effectiveness and safety in patients undergoing colon resection.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Assess the Effect on Recovery of GI Motility and Safety and to Determine the Optimal Dose of LD02GIFRO
